message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130. It's a great value, and I think you'll really appreciate it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I still believe I can find a better deal. I am willing to pay up to $110 for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to make one last compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125. It's a great value, and I think you'll really appreciate it.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product.
